testcase: NestedLoop join on empty expr with RIGHT JOIN and USE NL hint. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'HashJoin' END

statements: SELECT l.c11, l.c12, r.c22 FROM shellTest l JOIN shellTest r USE KEYS ["test21_ansijoin", "test22_ansijoin"] ON r.type = "right" AND l.c11 = r.c21 WHERE l.type = "left" AND l.c11 > 0 ORDER BY l.c11
